channel.title: News on First Baptist Church Muncie
channel.description: Recent content in News on First Baptist Church Muncie

item.title: Bible Study
item.description: Early Sunday School: Sundays, 9:15 AM (Intergenerational Class, children’s classes for various ages, youth Sunday school class) Late Sunday School: Sundays, 10:30 AM (Friendship) & 10:45 AM (Intergenerational Class)

item.title: February Visitor
item.description: The February Visitor is available online.

item.title: Opportunity to Serve at Christian Ministries
item.description: We have agreed to provide one meal a month for the Men’s Sleeping Room for seven months this winter.

item.title: Wednesday Music Rehearsals
item.description: 6:00 PM Praise Team, 6:15 PM Handbells, 7:30 PM Choir.

item.title: Children Involved in Service as Northern Seminary President Preaches
item.description: On Sunday, March 8, we will gather in a special combined service at 10:45 AM as we welcome the president of Northern Seminary.

item.title: Church Friends’ Lunch Set for March 8
item.description: On Sunday, March 8 after the combined service, the following people will gather in the lower auditorium to share lunch: church friends, the Taylor Gospel Choir members who will sing in our service, and people you don’t know from both services.

item.title: Donations to Benefit Grace Episcopal Church
item.description: Grace Episcopal Church, our neighbor down Adams Street, feeds between 70 and 110 people every Sunday afternoon at 3 p.

item.title: Easter Candy
item.description: Easter is right around the corner, and we are in need of candy donations for our annual children’s Easter Egg Hunt!

item.title: Sunday Morning Study
item.description: Are you looking for a good way to connect with other adults on Sunday mornings?

item.title: Visitor or Bulletin Information
item.description: If you would like an announcement in the March Visitor, please email it to Wade by Sunday, February 16.
